name: Validate Active Approver
script:
if not any(d.active for d in doc.custom_timesheet_approvers):
    frappe.throw("At least one Timesheet Approver must be marked as active.")

name: Create Approval Requests
script:
for td in doc.time_logs:
    if td.project is not None:
        project = frappe.get_doc("Project", td.project)
        for aprvr in project.custom_timesheet_approvers:
            new_approval = frappe.new_doc("Timesheet Task Approval")
            new_approval.approver = aprvr.approver
            new_approval.hours = td.hours
            new_approval.project = td.project
            new_approval.task = td.task
            new_approval.is_billable = td.is_billable
            new_approval.employee = doc.employee
            new_approval.status = "Pending"
            new_approval.timesheet = td.parent
            new_approval.insert()
            # Assign it to a specific user
            todo = frappe.new_doc("ToDo")
            todo.assigned_by = frappe.session.user
            todo.owner = aprvr.approver
            todo.reference_type = "Timesheet Task Approval"
            todo.reference_name = new_approval.name
            todo.description = "New task approval required."
            todo.save()
